alert.note: Alert for Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 10:41PM CDT until June 20 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... East central Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1040 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles east of Hayes Center, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Frontier and east central Hayes Counties. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 36 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and a Flash Flood Warning is in effect. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
